title: Edelman's Suspension & NFL Marriages Made To Last
itunes:title: Edelman's Suspension & NFL Marriages Made To Last
description:
A room filled with heroes- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling & Marc Sessler- gather here today to celebrate the engagement of The Mailman & The Paramore. The heroes react to the news of Julian Edelman’s suspension (8:30), drama with the Eagles at The White House (13:00), Carson Wentz cleared (19:30), Ryan Shazier says his dream is to return to the NFL (24:00) and Terrell Owens’ decision not to attend the HOF induction ceremony (28:00). The heroes are then joined by The Paramore herself, Lakisha, to discuss the happy couple’s eventual nuptials, along with their thoughts on some NFL marriages - and whether they’re made to last (32:00).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
